CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: LanzaTech Global, Inc. transforms waste carbon into materials, such as sustainable fuels, fabrics, packaging, and other products. The Company is focused on its LanzaTech technology and its CarbonSmart IP licensing services. Its carbon recycling technology converts pollution to various products. The Company's carbon recycling technology is like retrofitting a brewery onto an emission source like a steel mill or a landfill site, but instead of using sugars and yeast to make beer, pollution is converted by bacteria to fuels and chemicals.
